trans-unit.source: Determines the output files for non-MSBuild project references.
trans-unit.target: Determina i file di output per riferimenti a progetti non MSBuild.

trans-unit.source: The `ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput` task searches for a special property set by the [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] IDE for the list of project GUIDs and their associated outputs.
trans-unit.target: Il `ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput` esegue la ricerca di una proprietà speciale impostata dall'attività di [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] IDE per l'elenco di GUID di progetto e di output associati.

trans-unit.source: The IDE only pre-resolves non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projects and in this way separates [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references from non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] references.
trans-unit.target: L'IDE di pre-consente di risolvere solo non[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] progetti e in questo modo separa [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] progetto i riferimenti non[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] riferimenti.

trans-unit.source: The IDE returns the list of [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projects as UnresolvedProjectReferences.
trans-unit.target: L'IDE restituisce l'elenco di [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] progetti come UnresolvedProjectReferences.

trans-unit.source: This enables the task to use more powerful [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] mechanisms to manipulate just the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references, such as.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo l'attività usi più potenti [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] meccanismi per modificare solo il [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] riferimenti, ad esempio al progetto.

trans-unit.source: calling into specific targets of references to get the manifest file name, which would not be possible with a mixed list of [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] and non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references.
trans-unit.target: la chiamata a destinazioni specifiche di riferimenti per ottenere il nome del file manifesto, che non sarebbe possibile con un elenco misto di [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] e non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] i riferimenti al progetto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if task execution succeeded; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'esecuzione dell'attività riesce. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an XML string containing resolved project outputs.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta una stringa XML che contiene gli output di progetto risolti.

trans-unit.source: An XML string containing resolved project outputs.
trans-unit.target: Stringa XML che contiene gli output di progetto risolti.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets resolved reference paths that preserve the original project reference attributes.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta percorsi di riferimento risolti che conservano gli attributi dei riferimenti al progetto originali.

trans-unit.source: The resolved reference paths that preserve the original project reference attributes.
trans-unit.target: Percorsi di riferimento risolti che conservano gli attributi dei riferimenti al progetto originali.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets project reference items that are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta elementi di riferimento al progetto in formato [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Project reference items that are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.
trans-unit.target: Elementi di riferimento al progetto in formato [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Since [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] only pre-resolves non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projects, the project reference items that could not be resolved using the pre-resolved list of outputs are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.
trans-unit.target: Poiché [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] solo pre-risolve non[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] progetti, gli elementi di riferimento di progetto che non è possibile risolvere utilizzando l'elenco prerisolto di output presenti il [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] formato.
